title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

title: The Godfather Part II
plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

title: 12 Angry Men
plot: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: Schindler's List
plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
plot: A bounty-hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
plot: After the Empire overpowers the Rebel Alliance, Luke Skywalker begins training with Jedi Master Yoda, while Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett pursue his friends across the galaxy.

title: The Matrix
plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Goodfellas
plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
plot: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

title: Interstellar
plot: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

title: Se7en
plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

title: Shichinin no samurai
plot: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, and he gathers six other samurai to join him.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: Saving Private Ryan
plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Cidade de Deus
plot: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

title: The Green Mile
plot: Paul Edgecomb, the head death row guard at a prison in 1930s Louisiana, meets an inmate, John Coffey, a black man who is accused of murdering two girls. His life changes drastically when he discovers that John has a special gift.

title: La vita Ã¨ bella
plot: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

title: Star Wars
plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Back to the Future
plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

title: The Pianist
plot: During WWII, acclaimed Polish musician Wladyslaw faces various struggles as he loses contact with his family. As the situation worsens, he hides in the ruins of Warsaw in order to survive.

title: Gladiator
plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Gisaengchung
plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Psycho
plot: A secretary on the run for embezzlement takes refuge at a secluded California motel owned by a repressed man and his overbearing mother.

title: The Lion King
plot: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Hotaru no haka
plot: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

title: The Departed
plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: Whiplash
plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: American History X
plot: Living a life marked by violence, neo-Nazi Derek finally goes to prison after killing two black youths. Upon his release, Derek vows to change; he hopes to prevent his brother, Danny, who idolizes Derek, from following in his footsteps.

title: Seppuku
plot: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

title: The Prestige
plot: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: LÃ©on
plot: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by LÃ©on, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protÃ©gÃ©e and learns the assassin's trade.

title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
plot: Miles Morales catapults across the multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

title: Casablanca
plot: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

title: The Usual Suspects
plot: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

title: Intouchables
plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
plot: Salvatore, a famous film director, returns to his hometown for the funeral of the local theater's film projectionist, Alfredo. He reminisces about his life as a young boy falling in love with cinema.

title: Modern Times
plot: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

title: Alien
plot: After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.

title: Rear Window
plot: A bored photographer recovering from a broken leg passes the time by watching his neighbors and begins to suspect one of them of murder.

title: C'era una volta il West
plot: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

title: Django Unchained
plot: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

title: Dune: Part Two
plot: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he endeavors to prevent a terrible future.

title: City Lights
plot: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

title: Apocalypse Now
plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

title: Memento
plot: Leonard Shelby, an insurance investigator, suffers from anterograde amnesia and uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife, which is the last thing he remembers.

title: WALLÂ·E
plot: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
plot: In 1936, archaeologists and adventurers of the U.S. government hired Indiana Jones to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis could obtain its extraordinary powers.

title: Das Leben der Anderen
plot: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: Sunset Blvd.
plot: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
plot: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

title: Paths of Glory
plot: A colonel defends three of his soldiers in a court-martial after they abandon a suicidal attack.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

title: 12th Fail
plot: The real-life story of IPS Officer Manoj Kumar Sharma and IRS Officer Shraddha Joshi.

title: The Shining
plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter, where a sinister presence influences the father into violence. At the same time, his psychic son sees horrifying forebodings from both the past and the future.

title: The Great Dictator
plot: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

title: Aliens
plot: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

title: Inglourious Basterds
plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
plot: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

title: Coco
plot: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: Amadeus
plot: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

title: Toy Story
plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

title: Avengers: Endgame
plot: After the devastating events of Vingadores: Guerra Infinita (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Oldeuboi
plot: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must track down his captor in five days.

title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
plot: A mentally unstable American general orders a hydrogen bomb attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to global nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

title: Good Will Hunting
plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: American Beauty
plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

title: Das Boot
plot: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

title: Braveheart
plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

title: Mononoke-hime
plot: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

title: Kimi no Na wa.
plot: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

title: Tengoku to jigoku
plot: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

title: 3 Idiots
plot: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

title: Joker
plot: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: Once Upon a Time in America
plot: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

title: Singin' in the Rain
plot: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

title: CapharnaÃ¼m
plot: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

title: Idi i smotri
plot: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

title: Requiem for a Dream
plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

title: Toy Story 3
plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
plot: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebel Alliance attempts to destroy the second Death Star while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

title: Jagten
plot: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories forever.

title: Ikiru
plot: A bureaucrat tries to find meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
plot: When a mysterious artifact is uncovered on the Moon, a spacecraft manned by two humans and one supercomputer is sent to Jupiter to find its origins.

title: Reservoir Dogs
plot: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

title: The Apartment
plot: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but office politics and his own romantic hopes complicate matters.

title: Lawrence of Arabia
plot: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

title: Incendies
plot: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

title: Scarface
plot: In the 1980s, a determined criminal-minded Cuban immigrant becomes the biggest drug smuggler in Miami, and is eventually undone by his own drug addiction.

title: Double Indemnity
plot: An insurance representative is seduced by a dissatisfied housewife into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, a claims investigator.

title: North by Northwest
plot: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

title: Heat
plot: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a verbal clue at their latest heist.

title: Citizen Kane
plot: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

title: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen MÃ¶rder
plot: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

title: Up
plot: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to South America in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

title: Full Metal Jacket
plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

title: Vertigo
plot: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

title: Le fabuleux destin d'AmÃ©lie Poulain
plot: Despite being caught in her imaginative world, young waitress Amelie decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey during which she finds true love.

title: Oppenheimer
plot: A dramatization of the life story of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist who had a large hand in the development of the atomic bombs that brought an end to World War II.

title: A Clockwork Orange
plot: Alex DeLarge and his droogs barbarize a decaying near-future.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
plot: A widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama defends a black man against a false rape charge while teaching his young children about the sad reality of prejudice.

title: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
plot: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

title: Die Hard
plot: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: The Sting
plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

title: Taare Zameen Par
plot: A young boy is thought to be nothing but a lazy troublemaker until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
plot: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

title: Metropolis
plot: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

title: Snatch
plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

title: L.A. Confidential
plot: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: Ladri di biciclette
plot: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen, endangering his efforts to find work. He and his son set out to find it.

title: Der Untergang
plot: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

title: Dangal
plot: Mahavir Singh Phogat, a former wrestler, decides to fulfill his dream of winning a gold medal for his country by training his daughters for the Commonwealth Games despite the existing social stigmas.

title: Taxi Driver
plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

title: Hamilton
plot: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: Batman Begins
plot: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: Green Book
plot: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

title: Per qualche dollaro in piÃ¹
plot: Two bounty killers with similar intentions but different motivations team up to track down a psychotic Mexican outlaw before he and his gang can carry out an audacious bank robbery.

title: Some Like It Hot
plot: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: The Truman Show
plot: An insurance salesman begins to suspect that his whole life is actually some sort of reality TV show.

title: Judgment at Nuremberg
plot: Fictionalized depiction of the 1947 Judges' Trial, the third of twelve trials of Nazi war criminals conducted by the American occupying forces in Nuremberg, Germany, in which former judges of Nazi Germany were tried for their actions.

title: The Kid
plot: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put their relationship in jeopardy.

title: The Father
plot: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

title: Shutter Island
plot: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: All About Eve
plot: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingÃ©nue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

title: There Will Be Blood
plot: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

title: Jurassic Park
plot: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

title: Casino
plot: In Las Vegas, two best friends--a casino executive and a Mafia enforcer--compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

title: The Sixth Sense
plot: After being shot by a resentful former patient whom he failed to help, a Philadelphia child psychologist seeks redemption by treating a young boy with a disturbing secret.

title: Ran
plot: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
plot: The story involves Maverick confronting his past while training a group of younger Top Gun graduates, including the son of his deceased best friend, for a dangerous mission.

title: No Country for Old Men
plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon the aftermath of a drug deal gone wrong and over two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

title: The Thing
plot: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

title: El laberinto del fauno
plot: In 1944 Spain, a girl is sent to live with her ruthless stepfather. During the night, she meets a fairy who takes her to an old faun. He tells her she's a princess, but must prove her royalty by surviving three gruesome tasks.

title: Unforgiven
plot: Retired Old West gunslinger Will Munny reluctantly takes on one last job to avenge an injustice with the help of his old partner and a newer outlaw known simply as The Schofield Kid.

title: A Beautiful Mind
plot: A mathematical genius, John Nash made an astonishing discovery early in his career and stood on the brink of international acclaim. But the handsome and arrogant Nash soon found himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
plot: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
plot: Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

title: YÃ´jinbÃ´
plot: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

title: Prisoners
plot: Keller Dover is facing every parent's worst nightmare. His six-year-old daughter, Anna, is missing, together with her friend, Joy, and as minutes turn to hours, panic sets in. The only lead is an RV that had been parked on their street.

title: Finding Nemo
plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: The Great Escape
plot: Allied officers in a German prisoner of war camp during World War II making a daring plan for a mass escape by hundreds of their men, hoping to draw German personnel and resources away from combat operations.

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
plot: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

title: Hauru no ugoku shiro
plot: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

title: The Elephant Man
plot: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous faÃ§ade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

title: The Wild Robot
plot: After a shipwreck, an intelligent robot called Roz is stranded on an uninhabited island. To survive the harsh environment, Roz bonds with the island's animals and cares for an orphaned baby goose.

title: Dial M for Murder
plot: A former tennis star arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.

title: RashÃ´mon
plot: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

title: Gone with the Wind
plot: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

title: Chinatown
plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

title: El secreto de sus ojos
plot: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
plot: When four small-time criminals lose a rigged poker game against a London kingpin, he gives them one week to settle their enormous debt.

title: Klaus
plot: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

title: V for Vendetta
plot: In a future British dystopian society, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow the tyrannical government - with the help of a young woman.

title: Inside Out
plot: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
plot: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
plot: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

title: Trainspotting
plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out despite the allure of drugs and the influence of friends.

title: Raging Bull
plot: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

title: Catch Me If You Can
plot: Barely 17 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

title: Fargo
plot: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

title: Warrior
plot: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2
plot: As the battle between the forces of good and evil in the wizarding world escalates, Harry Potter draws ever closer to his final confrontation with Voldemort.

title: Gran Torino
plot: After a Hmong teenager tries to steal his prized 1972 Gran Torino, a disgruntled, prejudiced Korean War veteran seeks to redeem both the boy and himself.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
plot: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

title: Million Dollar Baby
plot: Frankie, an ill-tempered old coach, reluctantly agrees to train aspiring boxer Maggie. Impressed with her determination and talent, he helps her become the best and the two soon form a close bond.

title: Tonari no Totoro
plot: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper and a drifter named Max.

title: Ben-Hur
plot: A Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, but it's not long before he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

title: Bacheha-ye aseman
plot: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

title: Barry Lyndon
plot: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

title: 12 Years a Slave
plot: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

title: Before Sunrise
plot: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

title: Blade Runner
plot: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
plot: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

title: Dead Poets Society
plot: Maverick teacher John Keating returns in 1959 to the prestigious New England boys' boarding school where he was once a star student, using poetry to embolden his pupils to new heights of self-expression.

title: Hacksaw Ridge
plot: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, serving during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

title: Gone Girl
plot: The husband of a missing woman becomes the chief suspect in her disappearance.

title: Salinui chueok
plot: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

title: In the Name of the Father
plot: An Irish man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. Meanwhile, a British lawyer fights to clear their names and free them.

title: Monsters, Inc.
plot: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

title: The Gold Rush
plot: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

title: Ratatouille
plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

title: Relatos salvajes
plot: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

title: Jaws
plot: When a massive killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Long Island, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

title: Sherlock Jr.
plot: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

title: The Deer Hunter
plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

title: Mary and Max.
plot: In 1976 Melbourne, a lonely 8-year-old girl strikes up a correspondence with an unlikely pen pal: a severely obese 44-year-old New Yorker with Asperger's syndrome.

title: The General
plot: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines.

title: Ford v Ferrari
plot: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

title: Le salaire de la peur
plot: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

title: On the Waterfront
plot: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
plot: A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his character.

title: Maharaja
plot: A barber seeks vengeance after his home is burglarized, cryptically telling police his "lakshmi" has been taken, leaving them uncertain if it's a person or object. His quest to recover the elusive "lakshmi" unfolds.

title: SmultronstÃ¤llet
plot: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

title: The Third Man
plot: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

title: Logan
plot: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

title: Rocky
plot: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

title: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Tsuzumi Yashiki-hen
plot: Tanjiro ventures to the south-southeast where he encounters a cowardly young man named Zenitsu Agatsuma. He is a fellow survivor from Final Selection and his sparrow asks Tanjiro to help keep him in line.

title: TÃ´kyÃ´ monogatari
plot: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

title: The Big Lebowski
plot: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

title: Spotlight
plot: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

title: Det sjunde inseglet
plot: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

title: Room
plot: A little boy is held captive in a room with his mother since his birth, so he has never known the world outside.

title: The Terminator
plot: A cyborg assassin from the future attempts to find and kill a young woman who is destined to give birth to a warrior that will lead a resistance to save humankind from extinction.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: Hotel Rwanda
plot: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

title: Platoon
plot: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

title: La haine
plot: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

title: Jai Bhim
plot: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

title: Before Sunset
plot: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

title: The Best Years of Our Lives
plot: Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

title: La passion de Jeanne d'Arc
plot: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

title: The Exorcist
plot: When a mysterious entity possesses a young girl, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her life.

title: The Wizard of Oz
plot: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others' wishes.

title: The Incredibles
plot: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

title: Rush
plot: James Hunt and Niki Lauda, two extremely skilled Formula One racers, have an intense rivalry with each other. However, it is their enmity that pushes them to their limits.

title: The Sound of Music
plot: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

title: Stand by Me
plot: A writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
plot: Professor Wilson discovers a lost Akita puppy on his way home. Despite objections from his wife, Hachi endears himself to the family and grows to be Parker's loyal companion. As their bond grows deeper, a beautiful relationship unfolds.

title: Network
plot: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about mass media for its own profit, but finds that his message may be difficult to control.

title: Babam ve Oglum
plot: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

title: Ah-ga-ssi
plot: In 1930s Korea, a girl is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress who lives a secluded life on a countryside estate. But the maid has a secret: She is a pickpocket recruited by a swindler to help seduce the Lady and steal her fortune.

title: To Be or Not to Be
plot: During the German occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

title: The Iron Giant
plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

title: La battaglia di Algeri
plot: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

title: Into the Wild
plot: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness.

title: The Grapes of Wrath
plot: An Oklahoma family, driven off their farm by the poverty and hopelessness of the Dust Bowl, joins the westward migration to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

title: Groundhog Day
plot: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day.

title: Un condamnÃ© Ã  mort s'est Ã©chappÃ© ou Le vent souffle oÃ¹ il veut
plot: A captured French Resistance fighter during World War II engineers a daunting escape from a German prison in France.

title: The Help
plot: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

title: Amores perros
plot: An amateur dog fighter, a supermodel, and a derelict assassin, all separately struggling to find love, find their lives transformed by a devastating car wreck in Mexico City.

title: Rebecca
plot: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: Koe no katachi
plot: A deaf girl, Shoko, is bullied by the popular Shoya. As Shoya continues to bully Shoko, the class turns its back on him. Shoko transfers and Shoya grows up as an outcast. Alone and depressed, the regretful Shoya finds Shoko to make amends.

title: Drishyam
plot: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

title: The Last Stand
plot: A retired military general is called back to duty when a terrorist group threatens to destroy a major city. With limited resources, he assembles a team of elite soldiers to stop the attack.

title: Ghosts of the Past
plot: A young woman inherits an old mansion and begins to experience strange occurrences. She uncovers a dark family secret and must confront the ghosts of her ancestors to break the curse.

title: The Secret Lab
plot: A group of friends stumbles upon a hidden laboratory where an eccentric scientist is conducting secret experiments. They must solve puzzles and outwit traps to uncover the lab's mysteries.

title: Supernova
plot: A team of astronauts is sent to explore a dying star in a distant galaxy. As they approach the supernova, they face life-threatening challenges and must work together to survive.

title: The Magical Key
plot: A curious child discovers an ancient key that opens a portal to a fantastical world. Along with new friends, they embark on an epic quest to protect the world from an evil sorcerer.

title: Dark Horizons
plot: A group of survivors must navigate a post-apocalyptic world overrun by mutants. They form uneasy alliances with other survivors to fight for resources and uncover the truth about the apocalypse.

title: The Spy's Shadow
plot: An elite spy is on the hunt for a rogue agent who has gone rogue and is planning to sell state secrets. The chase takes him through international cities and deadly encounters.

title: Underwater Odyssey
plot: A deep-sea research team is trapped in an underwater base after a catastrophic event. With limited supplies and rising pressure, they must figure out how to escape before time runs out.

title: The Quest for Eternity
plot: A young archaeologist embarks on an expedition to find an ancient artifact rumored to grant immortality. Along the way, he faces dangerous rivals and must decipher cryptic clues to uncover the artifact's location.

title: The Dragon's Fury
plot: In a kingdom threatened by a fearsome dragon, a young knight must learn the ancient ways of dragon-slaying to save his people. Along his journey, he discovers the true nature of the beast.

title: The Silent Witness
plot: A detective investigates a series of mysterious deaths linked to a local theater. As she digs deeper, she uncovers a dark conspiracy involving the town's elite.

title: Run for Your Life
plot: A young man is wrongly accused of a crime and goes on the run to clear his name. He must navigate dangerous situations and evade law enforcement to prove his innocence.

title: The Midnight Forest
plot: A group of teenagers venture into a haunted forest at night, determined to prove the supernatural stories are just myths. What they find there is more terrifying than they ever imagined.

title: The Lost Island
plot: A team of explorers discovers an uncharted island that holds the key to an ancient civilization's power. They must survive wild creatures and deadly traps to uncover its secrets.

title: The Little Princess
plot: A young orphan girl is taken to a grand boarding school, where she befriends other students and uncovers a mystery about her father's disappearance.

title: Beneath the Surface
plot: When an underwater mining operation uncovers an ancient alien artifact, the crew becomes entangled in a battle for survival against strange forces lurking beneath the ocean's depths.

title: Chasing Shadows
plot: A former detective, now living in seclusion, is pulled back into a case that ties him to a dangerous criminal from his past. With his life on the line, he must solve the mystery before it's too late.

title: The Secret Garden
plot: A young girl discovers a hidden garden on her late uncle's estate and begins to bring it back to life, uncovering not only the beauty of nature but also family secrets long buried.

title: Skyward Bound
plot: A young pilot sets off on her first solo flight, but when a powerful storm hits, she must use all her skills to navigate back to safety while uncovering a conspiracy that could change the world.

title: The Magic Compass
plot: A group of children find an ancient compass that leads them to a world filled with magical creatures and perilous adventures. They must work together to protect the compass from evil forces.

title: City of Thieves
plot: In a dystopian future, a group of rebels fights against a corrupt government controlling the city. A seasoned thief joins their ranks to help steal a powerful weapon that could bring freedom.

title: Edge of Reality
plot: A scientist's experiment goes wrong, causing reality to fracture and blur the line between dream and waking life. He must navigate the shifting world to find a way to fix his mistake.

title: The Enchanted Kingdom
plot: A young prince, cursed to live as a beast, must find true love before the curse consumes him. Along the way, he learns valuable lessons about kindness and sacrifice.

title: Riders of the Apocalypse
plot: In the midst of an apocalypse, a group of survivors, led by a former soldier, must fight off violent raiders and weather the coming storm in a battle to rebuild civilization.

title: The Dragon Knight
plot: A knight who has been searching for redemption is tasked with protecting a dragon egg from a dark sorcerer. Along his journey, he must face trials that test his courage and honor.

title: The Great Escape
plot: During World War II, a group of prisoners plan an elaborate escape from a high-security POW camp, risking everything for freedom and to bring hope to their fellow soldiers.

title: The Dreamer's Journey
plot: A young artist sets out on a journey to find inspiration for his masterpiece. Along the way, he faces personal struggles and unexpected encounters that change his view of the world.

title: The Dark Secrets
plot: A group of journalists investigating corruption within a powerful corporation find themselves caught in a dangerous game of cat and mouse as they uncover dark secrets that threaten their lives.

title: The Magic Mirror
plot: A young girl discovers a magical mirror that shows her alternate versions of her life. As she becomes obsessed, she must decide whether to change her destiny or embrace who she truly is.

title: The Last Guardian
plot: In a future where humanity is on the brink of extinction, the last remaining guardian of a sacred city must protect its secrets from invaders and uncover the truth behind its mystical power.

title: Outlaw's End
plot: A notorious outlaw on the run forms an uneasy alliance with a bounty hunter. Together, they must survive a lawless desert and evade a relentless posse intent on capturing them.

title: The Forbidden Tomb
plot: A group of archaeologists stumbles upon an ancient tomb believed to be cursed. As they uncover its secrets, they realize the tomb is more dangerous than they could ever imagine.

title: The Moonlight Heist
plot: A skilled thief plans to steal a priceless gem during a luxurious gala on the moon. But things go wrong when a rival thief shows up, and they must outwit each other to escape.

title: The Wishing Well
plot: A young boy discovers a magical well that grants wishes. But as his desires come true, he soon realizes the consequences of tampering with fate.

title: The Forest of Lost Souls
plot: A group of hikers gets lost in a forest rumored to be haunted. As they struggle to find their way out, they encounter strange and frightening creatures.

title: The Phantom Assassin
plot: An elite assassin is tasked with eliminating a high-profile target, but as the mission progresses, he begins to question his loyalty and the motives behind his orders.

title: The Butterfly Effect
plot: A scientist invents a machine that allows people to travel through time, but when he tries to fix his past mistakes, he inadvertently causes catastrophic changes in the future.

title: The Sky King
plot: A young prince must prove his worth to the people of his kingdom by embarking on a dangerous quest. Along the way, he learns valuable lessons about leadership and sacrifice.

title: The Fallen Angel
plot: An angel sent to protect a troubled woman falls in love with her. As their bond grows, he must choose between his duty and his heart.

title: The Kingdom of Fire
plot: In a medieval kingdom threatened by a fierce dragon, a young knight must unite warring factions and lead them to battle to protect his people from the fiery beast.

title: Beneath the Surface
plot: A group of deep-sea explorers discovers a hidden underwater city. As they explore its ruins, they awaken ancient forces that threaten their survival.

title: The Timekeeper
plot: A scientist accidentally creates a time machine and travels to a future where humanity is on the brink of extinction. He must figure out how to fix the timeline before it's too late.

title: The Enchanted Forest
plot: A young girl discovers a hidden forest filled with magical creatures and ancient powers. She must protect the forest from an evil sorcerer who seeks to control it.

title: The Silent Sea
plot: In the distant future, a team of astronauts is sent on a mission to retrieve a mysterious object from the Moon. They must survive the harsh conditions and uncover the truth behind the object's origin.

title: Echoes of the Past
plot: A historian uncovers a series of forgotten letters from the past that reveal dark secrets about her family's history. As she digs deeper, she uncovers a conspiracy that threatens her future.

title: The Icebreaker
plot: A research team trapped in the Arctic after their ship crashes must find a way to survive the extreme cold and navigate through dangerous territory to reach safety.

title: The Outcast
plot: A young woman, rejected by society for her unusual abilities, discovers that her powers are the key to saving the world from an ancient threat.

title: The Shadow Society
plot: A young hacker is recruited by a secret organization to expose a corrupt government. But as the conspiracy unfolds, she finds herself in over her head, struggling to survive.

title: The Awakening
plot: A scientist studying the effects of artificial intelligence on human consciousness begins to experience strange occurrences. She soon realizes she may be losing her grip on reality.

title: The Last Samurai
plot: A disillusioned American soldier is sent to Japan to train a group of samurai in modern warfare. But as he immerses himself in their culture, he must decide where his loyalties truly lie.

title: The Desert of Souls
plot: A group of explorers searching for a lost city in the desert encounters dangerous sandstorms, bandits, and supernatural forces as they fight to survive.

title: The Truth Revealed
plot: A journalist investigating a high-profile political scandal finds himself drawn into a web of deceit and danger as he uncovers the truth behind the lies.

title: The Ancient Curse
plot: A group of friends on a road trip stumbles upon an ancient artifact that unleashes a curse. They must figure out how to break the curse before it destroys them all.

title: The Eternal Night
plot: A vampire hunter tracks down an immortal vampire who has been terrorizing the city for centuries. Along the way, he uncovers the true nature of the vampire's curse.
